nfs4_op_create.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00124 
00138 #define arg_CREATE4 op->nfs_argop4_u.opcreate
00139 #define res_CREATE4 resp->nfs_resop4_u.opcreate
00140 
00141 int nfs4_op_create(  struct nfs_argop4 * op ,   
00142                      compound_data_t   * data,
00143                      struct nfs_resop4 * resp)
00144 {
00145   cache_entry_t      * pentry_parent = NULL ;
00146   cache_entry_t      * pentry_new = NULL ;
00147 
00148   fsal_attrib_list_t   attr_parent ;
00149   fsal_attrib_list_t   attr_new ;
00150   fsal_attrib_list_t   sattr ;
00151 
00152   fsal_attrib_list_t   attr_file ;
00153 
00154   fsal_handle_t      * pnewfsal_handle = NULL ;
00155   
00156   nfs_fh4              newfh4 ;
00157   cache_inode_status_t cache_status ;
00158   int                  status ;
00159   nfsstat4             rc ;
00160   int                  convrc = 0 ;
00161   
00162   fsal_accessmode_t mode = 0000 ;
00163   fsal_name_t       name ;
00164   
00165   cache_inode_create_arg_t create_arg;
00166 
00167   int             dont_touch_flags = 0 ;
00168   char            funcname[] = "nfs4_op_create" ;
00169   unsigned int    i = 0 ;  
00170   
00171   resp->resop = NFS4_OP_CREATE ;
00172   res_CREATE4.status =  NFS4_OK  ;
00173   
00174   /* If the filehandle is Empty */
00175   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Empty( &(data->currentFH  ) ) )
00176     {
00177       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00178       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00179     }
00180   
00181   /* If the filehandle is invalid */
00182   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Invalid( &(data->currentFH ) ) )
00183     {
00184       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00185       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00186     }
00187   
00188   /* Tests if the Filehandle is expired (for volatile filehandle) */
00189   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Expired( &(data->currentFH) ) )
00190     {
00191       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_FHEXPIRED ;
00192       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00193     }
00194   
00195   /* Pseudo Fs is explictely a Read-Only File system */
00196   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Pseudo(  &(data->currentFH) ) )
00197     {
00198       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_ROFS ;
00199       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00200     }
00201 
00202   /* Ask only for supported attributes */
00203   if( !nfs4_Fattr_Supported( &arg_CREATE4.createattrs ) )
00204     {
00205        res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP ;
00206        return res_CREATE4.status ;
00207     }
00208 
00209   /* Do not use READ attr, use WRITE attr */
00210   if( !nfs4_Fattr_Check_Access( &arg_CREATE4.createattrs, FATTR4_ATTR_WRITE ) )
00211     {
00212       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00213       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00214     }
00215 
00216   /* Check for name to long */
00217   if( arg_CREATE4.objname.utf8string_len > FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN )
00218     {
00219       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_NAMETOOLONG ;
00220       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00221     }
00222   
00223   /* 
00224    * This operation is used to create a non-regular file, 
00225    * this means: - a symbolic link
00226    *             - a block device file
00227    *             - a character device file
00228    *             - a socket file
00229    *             - a fifo
00230    *             - a directory 
00231    *
00232    * You can't use this operation to create a regular file, you have to use NFS4_OP_OPEN for this
00233    */
00234   
00235   /* Convert the UFT8 objname to a regular string */
00236   if( arg_CREATE4.objname.utf8string_len == 0 )
00237     {
00238       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00239       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00240     }
00241   
00242   if( utf82str( name.name, &arg_CREATE4.objname ) == -1 )
00243     {
00244       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00245       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00246     }
00247   name.len = strlen( name.name ) ;
00248  
00249    /* Sanuty check: never create a directory named '.' or '..' */
00250    if(  arg_CREATE4.objtype.type == NF4DIR  )
00251      {
00252         if( !FSAL_namecmp( &name, &FSAL_DOT ) || !FSAL_namecmp( &name, &FSAL_DOT_DOT )  )
00253           {
00254              res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_BADNAME ;
00255              return res_CREATE4.status ;
00256           }
00257 
00258      }
00259 
00260   /* Filename should contain not slash */
00261   for( i = 0 ; i < name.len ; i ++ )
00262     {
00263         if( name.name[i] == '/' ) 
00264           {
00265              res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_BADCHAR ;
00266              return res_CREATE4.status ;
00267           }
00268     } 
00269   /* Convert current FH into a cached entry, the current_pentry (assocated with the current FH will be used for this */
00270   pentry_parent = data->current_entry ;
00271 
00272   /* The currentFH must point to a directory (objects are always created within a directory) */
00273   if( data->current_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING && data->current_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE )
00274     {
00275       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_NOTDIR ;
00276       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00277     }
00278   
00279   /* get attributes of parent directory, for 'change4' info replyed */
00280   if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( pentry_parent, 
00281                                             &attr_parent,
00282                                             data->ht,
00283                                             data->pclient, 
00284                                             data->pcontext, 
00285                                             &cache_status) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00286     {
00287       res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00288       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00289     }
00290   /* Change info for client cache coherency, pentry internal_md is used for that */
00291   memset( &(res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before), 0, sizeof( changeid4 ) ) ;
00292   res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before = (changeid4)pentry_parent->internal_md.mod_time;
00293 
00294   /* Convert the incoming fattr4 to a vattr structure, if such arguments are supplied */
00295   if( arg_CREATE4.createattrs.attrmask.bitmap4_len != 0 )
00296     {
00297       /* Arguments were supplied, extract them */
00298       convrc = nfs4_Fattr_To_FSAL_attr( &sattr, &(arg_CREATE4.createattrs) ) ; 
00299 
00300       if( convrc == 0 )
00301         {
00302           res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP  ;
00303           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00304         }
00305 
00306       if( convrc == -1 )
00307         {
00308           res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_BADXDR ;
00309           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00310         }
00311     }
00312   
00313   /* Create either a symbolic link or a directory */
00314   switch( arg_CREATE4.objtype.type ) 
00315     {
00316     case NF4LNK :
00317       /* Convert the name to link from into a regular string */
00318       if( arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.linkdata.utf8string_len == 0 )
00319         {
00320           res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00321           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00322         }
00323       else
00324         {
00325           if( utf82str( create_arg.link_content.path, &arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.linkdata ) == -1 )
00326             {
00327               res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00328               return res_CREATE4.status ;
00329             }
00330           create_arg.link_content.len = strlen( create_arg.link_content.path ) ;
00331         }
00332       
00333       /* do the symlink operation */
00334       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00335                                              &name, 
00336                                              SYMBOLIC_LINK, 
00337                                              mode, 
00338                                              &create_arg, 
00339                                              &attr_new,
00340                                              data->ht, 
00341                                              data->pclient, 
00342                                              data->pcontext, 
00343                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00344          {
00345            res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00346            return res_CREATE4.status ;
00347          }      
00348 
00349      /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00350      if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00351        {
00352          res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00353          return res_CREATE4.status ;
00354        }
00355 
00356 
00357             
00358       break ;
00359     case NF4DIR:
00360       /* Create a new directory */
00361       /* do the symlink operation */
00362       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00363                                              &name, 
00364                                              DIR_BEGINNING,
00365                                              mode, 
00366                                              &create_arg, 
00367                                              &attr_new,
00368                                              data->ht, 
00369                                              data->pclient, 
00370                                              data->pcontext, 
00371                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00372          {
00373            res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00374            return res_CREATE4.status ;
00375          }      
00376          
00377       /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00378       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00379        {
00380           res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00381           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00382        }    
00383       break ;
00384       
00385     case NF4SOCK:
00386       
00387       /* Create a new socket file */
00388       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00389                                              &name, 
00390                                              SOCKET_FILE,
00391                                              mode,
00392                                              NULL,
00393                                              &attr_new,
00394                                              data->ht,
00395                                              data->pclient,
00396                                              data->pcontext,
00397                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00398       {
00399         res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00400         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00401       }      
00402 
00403       /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00404       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00405       {
00406         res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00407         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00408       }   
00409      break ;
00410 
00411     case NF4FIFO:
00412       
00413       /* Create a new socket file */
00414       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00415                                              &name, 
00416                                              FIFO_FILE,
00417                                              mode,
00418                                              NULL,
00419                                              &attr_new,
00420                                              data->ht,
00421                                              data->pclient,
00422                                              data->pcontext,
00423                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00424       {
00425         res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00426         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00427       }      
00428 
00429       /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00430       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00431       {
00432         res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00433         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00434       }   
00435      break ;
00436 
00437     case NF4CHR:
00438       
00439       create_arg.dev_spec.major = arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.devdata.specdata1;
00440       create_arg.dev_spec.minor = arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.devdata.specdata2;
00441       
00442       /* Create a new socket file */
00443       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00444                                              &name, 
00445                                              CHARACTER_FILE,
00446                                              mode,
00447                                              &create_arg,
00448                                              &attr_new,
00449                                              data->ht,
00450                                              data->pclient,
00451                                              data->pcontext,
00452                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00453       {
00454         res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00455         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00456       }      
00457 
00458       /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00459       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00460       {
00461         res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00462         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00463       }   
00464      break ;
00465      
00466     case NF4BLK:
00467       
00468       create_arg.dev_spec.major = arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.devdata.specdata1;
00469       create_arg.dev_spec.minor = arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.devdata.specdata2;
00470       
00471       /* Create a new socket file */
00472       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00473                                              &name, 
00474                                              BLOCK_FILE,
00475                                              mode,
00476                                              &create_arg,
00477                                              &attr_new,
00478                                              data->ht,
00479                                              data->pclient,
00480                                              data->pcontext,
00481                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00482       {
00483         res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00484         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00485       }      
00486 
00487       /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00488       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00489       {
00490         res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00491         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00492       }   
00493      break ;
00494           
00495     default:
00496       /* Should never happen, but return NFS4ERR_BADTYPE in this case */
00497       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_BADTYPE ;
00498       return  res_CREATE4.status ;
00499       break ;
00500     } /* switch( arg_CREATE4.objtype.type ) */
00501   
00502   
00503   /* Now produce the filehandle to this file */
00504   if( ( pnewfsal_handle = cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( pentry_new, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00505     {
00506       res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00507       return  res_CREATE4.status ;
00508     }
00509   
00510   /* Allocation of a new file handle */
00511   if( nfs4_AllocateFH( &newfh4 ) != NFS4_OK )
00512     {
00513       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00514       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00515     }
00516 
00517   /* Building the new file handle */
00518   if( !nfs4_FSALToFhandle( &newfh4, pnewfsal_handle, data ) )
00519     {
00520       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00521       return  res_CREATE4.status ;
00522     }
00523   
00524   /* This new fh replaces the current FH */
00525   data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_len = newfh4.nfs_fh4_len ;
00526   memcpy( data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_val, newfh4.nfs_fh4_val, newfh4.nfs_fh4_len ) ;
00527   
00528   /* No do not need newfh any more */
00529   Mem_Free( (char *)newfh4.nfs_fh4_val ) ;
00530   
00531   /* Set the mode if requested */
00532   /* Use the same fattr mask for reply, if one attribute was not settable, NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP was replyied */
00533   res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_len = arg_CREATE4.createattrs.attrmask.bitmap4_len ;
00534   
00535   if( arg_CREATE4.createattrs.attrmask.bitmap4_len != 0 )
00536     {
00537       if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_setattr( pentry_new,
00538                                                 &sattr,
00539                                                 data->ht, 
00540                                                 data->pclient, 
00541                                                 data->pcontext, 
00542                                                 &cache_status ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00543         
00544         {
00545           res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00546           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00547         }
00548       
00549       /* Allocate a new bitmap */
00550       res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_val = 
00551         (unsigned int *)Mem_Alloc( res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_len ) ;
00552 
00553       if( res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_val == NULL )
00554         {
00555           res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00556           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00557         }
00558       memset( res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_val, 0, res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_len ) ;
00559 
00560       memcpy( res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_val, 
00561               arg_CREATE4.createattrs.attrmask.bitmap4_val, 
00562               res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_len ) ;
00563     }
00564   
00565   /* Get the change info on parent directory after the operation was successfull */
00566   if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( pentry_parent, 
00567                                             &attr_parent, 
00568                                             data->ht, 
00569                                             data->pclient, 
00570                                             data->pcontext, 
00571                                             &cache_status ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00572     {
00573       res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00574       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00575     } 
00576   memset( &(res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after), 0, sizeof( changeid4 ) );
00577   res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after = (changeid4)pentry_parent->internal_md.mod_time ;
00578   
00579   /* Operation is supposed to be atomic .... */
00580   res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.atomic = TRUE ;
00581   
00582 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_V4
00583   printf( "           CREATE CINFO before = %llu  after = %llu  atomic = %d\n", 
00584           res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before, 
00585           res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after, 
00586           res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.atomic ) ;
00587 #endif
00588 
00589   /* @todo : BUGAZOMEU: fair ele free dans cette fonction */
00590   
00591   /* Keep the vnode entry for the file in the compound data */
00592   data->current_entry = pentry_new ;
00593   data->current_filetype = pentry_new->internal_md.type ;
00594   
00595   /* If you reach this point, then no error occured */
00596   res_CREATE4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00597   
00598   return res_CREATE4.status;
00599 } /* nfs4_op_create */
00600 
00601 
00612 void nfs4_op_create_Free( CREATE4res * resp )
00613 {
00614   if( resp->status == NFS4_OK )
00615     Mem_Free( resp->CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_val ) ;
00616 
00617   return ;
00618 } /* nfs4_op_create_Free */
